author: Dr15Jones
body:
#### PR description:

All DB construction was switched to using EventSetup. Cases using reading from files were kept local to module.
The new ESProducer was added as a Task to all needed Sequences.

#### PR validation:

Code compiles.

backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/42514 and https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/42597
title: Moved creating SiPixelTemplateStore from DB to an ESProducer [13_1]
